name: Carnibal
description:
Carnibal is a narrative driven, survival, walking-simulator. 

When a traveler is suspected of murder he abuses a mistaken identity as the new town doctor. It might be the only way to save himself from cannibalistic justice. 

Can you manoeuvre your way through the flapping jaws of your new village neighbours? Be witty, be careful, DON'T be dinner.

You can only fool these cannibals into thinking you are their long-overdue local healer for so long. At some point you will slip up, say the wrong thing and... Well, try to live another day!
